content: Is there any plan to have rust-analyzer available as a rustup component? The doc mentions it as part of the 'complete' profile (https://github.com/rust-lang/rustup#profiles) but I believe it is a typo for rust-analysis?
This is currently blocked on figuring out vendoring story (see ehuss comment)
I probably won't be able to fix that this or the next week, but if someone picks up the work, that would be very helpful!
